project.compatibility: USFM projects and ${translation_studio} projects (saved in version 11 or greater) are supported.

users.logged_out: Please log in with your Door43 account.
users.to_continue_to_projects: To continue to Projects, click "Continue to Project"
users.create_door43_account: If you do not have a Door43 account, you may create one.

login.door43_information:
Door43 is a free, online, revision-controlled content management
system for open-licensed biblical material.

It provides free, remote storage and collaboration services
for creators and translators of biblical content.
login.guest_information: You can choose to be a Guest and keep your identity anonymous.
login.create_account_not_available: TranslationCore does not currently support creating a Door43 account. You may create an account online at:
